attributes.action: Allow free Biscuits to dunk in a cup of tea.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe we, the Great British public, should be allowed free biscuits to dunk in our cup of Tea, whenever we enjoy a cup of this majestic beauty. Please sign, as this is a national past time and a value in this society that may one day slip into the abyss.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
